article_title: Sara DeGregoria: Health insurance: An unfortunately epic tale
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Scattered showers and thunderstorms. High 79F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms early, then cloudy skies after midnight. Low 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

article_metadata.description: Do I think a single-payer system would benefit America? Take a wild guess.
article_metadata.author: SARA DeGREGORIA | local guest columnist
